movie.title: The Mercy
movie.plot: In 1968, Donald Crowhurst, an amateur sailor, endangers the fate of his family and business, and his own life, blinded by his ambition to compete in the Sunday Times Golden Globe Race, attempting to become the first person in history to single-handedly circumnavigate the world without making any stopover.

events.title: Donald Crowhurst begins his around the world sailing attempt in the Teignmouth Electron
the Teignmouth Electron is found abandoned
Donald Crowhurst writes his final confession
